LanguageData.bs.xsc.HybridTooltip: The chance for pawns to spawn with a set of genes generated from two valid parent Xenotypes
LanguageData.bs.xsc.RandomGenesTooltip: The chance for pawns to spawn with entirely random genes, only constrained by metabolism limits
LanguageData.bs.xsc.ConfirmResetXenotypeSpawnControl: Really reset all Xenotype Spawn Control settings?
LanguageData.bs.xsc.IndividualAbsoluteModeToggleToolt: Toggle whether this Xenotype uses absolute chances
